data.name: Whisper Out Of Time
data.detailed_description:
The world is a big place and there is much to do. As Julius Ibidus, you will discover the world of Whisper Out of Time and its many inhabitants! There is much to find and many stories to uncover.

  • EXPERIENCE THE LOCAL WILDLIFE!
Yetis, slugs, reptiles, and more! All sorts of beasties want to get to know you! Maybe, some of them won’t try to eat you!




  • LEARN ABOUT THEIR CULTURE!
There is more to life than just hunting and farming, right? Sure there is! Through Rock, Paper, and Scissors; you will get a worms-eye view of their lives. Will it make sense?
Absolutely! Will it always make sense? For sure! Will i-No more questions, next!



  • HUNT AND FARM AND BUILD!
In your downtime, why don’t go out to the Meadow and harvest some resources? There are all sorts of funky things you can do with them! You know... like... umm... just go to the Meadow!



  • A WORLD OF WONDERS
You are completely safe here! There is no such thing as monsters, poverty, starvation, confusion, or any bad things here! Absolutely and completely safe! Yep, no problems here! None whatsoever

One question: just how much input do you have in what you say and do?

data.short_description: Whisper Out of Time is many things: Role playing game with a focus on the Role, life simulator in a unique setting, and a fun journey with a, hopefully, even more unique story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:  64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:  64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
